containerDefinitions.name: migration-fix
command: python3 -c "import psycopg; import os; db_url = os.environ['APP_DATABASE_URL'].replace('postgresql+asyncpg://', 'postgresql://'); conn = psycopg.connect(db_url); cur = conn.cursor(); print('Checking current migration state...'); cur.execute('SELECT version_num FROM alembic_version ORDER BY version_num'); versions = cur.fetchall(); print(f'Current versions: {versions}'); cur.execute(\"INSERT INTO alembic_version (version_num) VALUES ('499278ad9251') ON CONFLICT (version_num) DO NOTHING\"); conn.commit(); print('Successfully inserted missing migration 499278ad9251'); cur.execute('SELECT version_num FROM alembic_version ORDER BY version_num'); final_versions = cur.fetchall(); print(f'Final versions: {final_versions}'); conn.close(); print('Migration fix completed successfully')"
